content: How would the accessibility of the watermelon change for Cameron if it were moved from basket to the trash bin. Answer with "more accessible", "equally accessible", or "less accessible".
How would the accessibility of the tomato change for Dallas if it were moved from bucket to the salad bowl. Answer with "more accessible", "equally accessible", or "less accessible".
How would the accessibility of the cucumber change for Autumn if it were moved from treasure_chest to refrigerator. Answer with "more accessible", "equally accessible", or "less accessible".
How would the accessibility of the undershirt change for Michael if it were moved from box to Makayla's laundry basket. Answer with "more accessible", "equally accessible", or "less accessible".
